summary: Completed comprehensive testing of child-facing Store and Investment pages. All 15 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend UI tests passed including admin login, Store page with categories/items/unit display, Investment page (Money Garden for K-2, Stock Market for 3-5), and Plant/Stock dialogs showing admin-created assets.
passed_tests: ✅ Admin login with credentials admin@learnersplanet.com / finlit@2026
✅ Store page (/store) shows admin-created categories (Aashi's Veggie Shop, Khushi's Fruit Shop)
✅ Store page shows admin-created items (Red Carrots, Red Tomatoes, Mangoes) with images
✅ Store items display price with unit suffix (₹50/kg, ₹35/kg, ₹100/pc)
✅ Investment page (/investments) shows Money Garden for grade 2 user
✅ Investment page shows Stock Market for grade 4 user
✅ Investment page shows admin-created plant (Sunflower Seeds) with image, price ₹10/seed, Min: 3
✅ Investment page shows admin-created stock (Adani Steel) with logo, price ₹20/share, Min: 5
✅ Plant Something New dialog shows admin-created plants
✅ Buy New Stock dialog shows admin-created stocks
✅ Investment buy API uses correct field name 'investment_type'
✅ Investment sell API uses correct field name 'holding_id'
✅ Investment portfolio API returns holdings array correctly
✅ Admin Store Management - Unit field dropdown working (piece, kg, gram, litre, etc.)
✅ Store API returns items for admin users (who have null grade)
seed_data_creation: Test child users (grade 2 and grade 4) were created for testing and cleaned up after. Admin-created store items (Carrots, Tomatoes, Mangoes) and investments (Sunflower Seeds plant, Adani Steel stock) were verified.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Child-facing Store and Investment pages fully tested and working. Store page at /store shows admin-created categories and items with price+unit display. Investment page at /investments shows Money Garden (plants) for K-2 grades and Stock Market (stocks) for grades 3-5. All CRUD operations for investments (buy/sell) working correctly with proper field names (investment_type, holding_id). Admin Store Management unit dropdown working.
